nodes.text: To break this vicious circle Shaath said the United States needs to recommit to the roadmap process insist that Israel negotiate directly with the Palestinian Authority and enforce a complete ceasefire on both sides
Israeli occupation of Palestinian territories caused instability
the failure to end the Israeli occupation of Palestinian territories was at the root of many of the Middle East s woes.
Decades of instability he said have reduced foreign investment in the region to a trickle.
The only means to improve the economy and the political conditions of Middle East is to insist on the reconciliation between Israeli and Palestinians
